.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_local_funs.py:


Example of local functions
===========================

Using functions without defining a package


.. code-block:: default



    def ex_localfun(a, b):
        c = b - 2*a    
        print(c)




.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-timing

   **Total running time of the script:** ( 0 minutes  0.000 seconds)
